amendment.description: To improve the Federal Trade Commission's ability to protect consumers from price-gouging during energy emergencies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 2612 proposed by Senator Cantwell.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2612.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2612 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 42. Record Vote Number: 334.
Amendment SA 2612 ruled out of order by the chair.
